name: notesaw-preview
description: An extension markup language of Markdown designed for note-taking and documentation.

commands.title: Start Notesaw preview to the Side
Export current Notesaw file to raw HTML (styles not included)
Export current Notesaw file to PDF

notesaw.theme.description: Theme for rendering the preview. 'follow-vscode' will match the VSCode theme (light or dark). 'follow-system' will match the system theme.
notesaw.theme.markdownDescription: Theme for rendering the preview. 'follow-vscode' will match the VSCode theme (light or dark). 'follow-system' will match the system theme.

notesaw.pdfOptions.puppeteerPath.description: Path to the Chromium or Chrome executable to be used by Puppeteer. Leave empty to use the bundled Chromium.

notesaw.pdfOptions.format.description: The format of the PDF to be generated. See Puppeteer docs for more details.
notesaw.pdfOptions.format.markdownDescription: The format of the PDF to be generated. See [Puppeteer docs](https://pptr.dev/api/puppeteer.pdfoptions) for more details.

notesaw.pdfOptions.forceWhiteBackground.description: Whether to force a white background in the PDF, regardless of the theme used in the preview. If true, both omitBackground and printBackground in Puppeteer PDF options will be set to false.
notesaw.pdfOptions.forceWhiteBackground.markdownDescription: Whether to force a white background in the PDF, regardless of the theme used in the preview. If true, both `omitBackground` and `printBackground` in Puppeteer PDF options will be set to false.

notesaw.pdfOptions.landscape.description: Whether to export the PDF in landscape orientation.

notesaw.pdfOptions.margin.description: PDF page margins. Each value can be a string with units (e.g. '20mm', '1cm', '10px'). See Puppeteer docs for more details.
notesaw.pdfOptions.margin.markdownDescription: PDF page margins. Each value can be a string with units (e.g. '20mm', '1cm', '10px'). See [Puppeteer docs](https://pptr.dev/api/puppeteer.pdfoptions) for more details.

notesaw.pdfOptions.displayHeaderFooter.description: Whether to display header and footer in the PDF.

notesaw.pdfOptions.headerTemplate.description: Only works if displayHeaderFooter is true. HTML template for the PDF header, set empty to omit. See Puppeteer docs for supported variables.
notesaw.pdfOptions.headerTemplate.markdownDescription: Only works if `displayHeaderFooter` is true. HTML template for the PDF header, set empty to omit. See [Puppeteer docs](https://pptr.dev/api/puppeteer.pdfoptions) for supported variables.

notesaw.pdfOptions.footerTemplate.description: Only works if displayHeaderFooter is true. HTML template for the PDF footer, set empty to omit. See Puppeteer docs for supported variables.
notesaw.pdfOptions.footerTemplate.markdownDescription: Only works if `displayHeaderFooter` is true. HTML template for the PDF footer, set empty to omit. See [Puppeteer docs](https://pptr.dev/api/puppeteer.pdfoptions) for supported variables.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
